description: 41 guides, 1 app. Welcome to Hg2 - the city guide series coveted by travellers who value both style and substance when it comes to soaking up a city. We're not about the most expensive shops, bars, restaurants and hotels - we're about the best. All our guides are compiled by writers who have lived in each city, with content that is packed with insider knowledge and a voice that is irreverent, inspired, and, above all, intelligent. All Hg2 travel content is stored on your TouchPad - only using data connections for features such as maps, check-in and sound track to the city to minimise data roaming costs. This is the ultimate Hg2 app – packed with destination information on 41 cities and ski resorts around the world – it is the perfect companion to any trip away. This master application has taken 5 years to research and photograph – and includes over 10,000 hand-picked and tested hotels, restaurants, bars, cafés, clubs, spas, shops, sights and things to do. We eat and drink in every single venue we review incognito and this is a filtered collection of the best places to guarantee an amazing time, both home and away. The 2011 edition is constantly updated with new openings, closures and relevant information – the master edition will also include three new cities due to come online over the first half of 2011. “Hg2 is about foreign life as art” – Vanity Fair “The new travel must-haves” – The Daily Telegraph “A minor bible” – The New York Times “Excellent guides for stylish travellers” – Harper’s Bazaar “Insight into what’s really going on” - Tatler
